title: SEO - Discovery & Strategy
description: Outcome-focused workshops, roadmaps, KPIs, and risk framing before we write code.

hero.headline: SEO Strategy That Drives Organic Growth
hero.subheadline: Technical SEO audits, content strategy, and Core Web Vitals optimization to rank higher and convert better.

benefits.title: Technical SEO Audits
benefits.description: Crawl analysis, site architecture review, and structured data validation to fix foundational issues.

benefits.title: Core Web Vitals Optimization
benefits.description: LCP, FID, CLS improvements through performance engineering and rendering strategies.

benefits.title: Content Strategy & Mapping
benefits.description: Keyword research, topic clustering, and content roadmaps aligned with search intent.

benefits.title: On-Page SEO
benefits.description: Meta tags, semantic HTML, internal linking, and schema markup for better indexing.

benefits.title: Link Building & Outreach
benefits.description: White-hat backlink strategies, digital PR, and partnership opportunities to build authority.

benefits.title: Analytics & Reporting
benefits.description: GA4/Search Console dashboards, rank tracking, and ROI measurement for continuous optimization.

process.title: SEO Audit & Discovery
process.description: Crawl site, analyze competitors, review analytics, and identify quick wins + long-term opportunities.

process.title: Strategy & Roadmap
process.description: Prioritize fixes, define KPIs, and build quarterly SEO roadmap aligned with business goals.

process.title: Implementation & Optimization
process.description: Fix technical issues, optimize content, improve Core Web Vitals, and implement tracking.

process.title: Monitoring & Iteration
process.description: Track rankings, organic traffic, and conversions; adjust strategy based on performance data.

ui.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how we can help you achieve your goals with {{service}}.
